${modID}:SliceOfCake.NAME: Slice of Cake
${modID}:SliceOfCake.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! theHuman:Healthiness. NL Make a wish.

theHuman:DumpsterDiving.NAME: Dumpster Diving
theHuman:DumpsterDiving.DESCRIPTION: Find !M! thehuman:Junk. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, find !${modID}:DISCARD! thehuman:Junk.

theHuman:KeepingFit.NAME: Apple a Day
theHuman:KeepingFit.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! thehuman:Healthiness at the start of your turn. NL If you start your turn with !${modID}:LIMIT! or more thehuman:Healthiness, add a *Lollipop to your hand instead.

theHuman:Ageing.NAME: Aikido
theHuman:Ageing.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain !M! Dexterity. NL Otherwise, enemy loses !M! Strength. NL [#a83277]Technique[]: add a copy of this to your discard pile.

theHuman:Arcade.NAME: Door Kick
theHuman:Arcade.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! thehuman:Healthiness. NL Deal !D! damage. NL [#a83277]Technique[]: gain !${modID}:HEALTH! thehuman:Healthiness.

theHuman:BackPain.NAME: Reevaluate
theHuman:BackPain.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Activate all [#2000a7]Lifestyle[] effects in your discard pile.
theHuman:BackPain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. draw !M! cards. Activate all [#2000a7]Lifestyle[] effects in your draw and discard piles. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

theHuman:Physiotherapy.NAME: Physiotherapy
theHuman:Physiotherapy.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 3 cards. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! thehuman:Healthiness.

theHuman:TrashToTreasure.NAME: Trash To Treasure
theHuman:TrashToTreasure.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all thehuman:Junk in your hand. NL For each thehuman:Junk Exhausted this way, gain [E] .

theHuman:Exercise.NAME: Exercise
theHuman:Exercise.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]  for every 5 theHuman:Healthiness you have. NL [#2000a7]Lifestyle[]: gain 1 theHuman:Healthiness.

theHuman:OnTheStreets.NAME: On The Streets
theHuman:OnTheStreets.DESCRIPTION: When drawn, deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Add a thehuman:Weapon and !M! thehuman:Junk to your hand.

theHuman:Risktaker.NAME: Jerry Rig
theHuman:Risktaker.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you discard a card, find 1 theHuman:Junk.

theHuman:SilverGeneration.NAME: At Peace
theHuman:SilverGeneration.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! theHuman:Healthiness and !M! theHuman:Peaceful.

theHuman:Happiness.NAME: Yoga
theHuman:Happiness.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! thehuman:Healthiness. NL Shuffle a *Deep *Thought into your draw pile.
theHuman:Happiness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! thehuman:Healthiness. NL Add a *Deep *Thought into your hand.

theHuman:LivingItUp.NAME: Living It Up
theHuman:LivingItUp.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw !M! card{!Upgrades!|>0=s}. NL Discard !M! card{!Upgrades!|>0=s}. NL [#2000a7]Lifestyle[]: gain [E] . NL thehuman:Inventory.

theHuman:GarbageCollector.NAME: Garbage Collector
theHuman:GarbageCollector.DESCRIPTION: {@@}The first {!Upgrades!|>0=!M!} theHuman:Junk you play each turn {!Upgrades!|0=is|@=are} played twice.
